Container.Name: Ubooquity
Container.Description: Ubooquity is a free, lightweight and easy-to-use home server for your comics and ebooks. Use it to access your files from anywhere, with a tablet, an e-reader, a phone or a computer.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : set this path to where you wish Ubooquity to store it's configuration, logs, database and jar file.[br] [b]/mnt[/b] : this path is a location from which your digital documents will be accessible from.[br]
